basic_information.scholarship_name: Brian Jay Walke Ethics in Journalism Scholarship

description: The recipient(s) of the Brian Jay Walke Ethics in Journalism Endowed Scholarship will be selected by the annual selection committee for the Oklahoma Journalism Hall of Fame. The recipient(s) will be selected in the spring for distribution the following fall semester. Criteria will be: Complete application and transcript Full-time undergraduate student Minimum 3.0 GPA Major in Journalism 500 word essay on the importance of ethics in journalism

general_criteria.description: Soft requirements that provide additional points/consideration

hard_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship
